name: COCO NOIR
description: An intimate, seductive, and intensely brilliant fragrance with luminous notes.

name: Burberry London
description: This scent is a modern, yet elegant scent which captures and celebrates the city of London and its distinctive style.

name: Romance Parfum
description: This concentrated composition of warm floral fragrances is meant to reflect the complexity of a sensual, modern romance.
